issue.title: Improve the monitor display view
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

The administration of the monitor is not on the same model than the other EasySDI modules (no menu, no Options etc...)

The url of the servlet was hardcoded as http://localhost:8080/Monitor

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi Thomas,

Thanks for this fix!
Can you please tell us where such URL can now be configured inside easySDI backoffice ?

**Original author :** Portier Thomas

In the options of the monitor in back office. The field existed but wasn't taken into account.
